summary: interaction of the viral spike (S) surface glycoprotein with the host cell receptor is recognized as the first step of infection and is the main determinant of virus tropism. the mechanisms by which neutralizing antibodies inhibit PEDV have not been defined. recombinant baculovirus fragments digested by EcoRI and HindIII. PCR product of S, M, N and ORF3 from recombinant baculovirus.
